body.name: OXO Tot Transitions Straw Cup with Removable Handles - 6 oz. - Opal
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 22 mins
features: Hinged cap protects spout, keeping it clean and helping prevent spills in diaper bags
Valve opens as soon as baby’s lips touch straw for easy drinking
Silicone spout is spill-proof and conforms to baby’s mouth
Spout and cap come apart for thorough cleaning
body.description: A great option for tots ready to use a straw, the 6 oz. Tot Transitions Straw Cup with Removable Handles features an almond-shaped straw that conforms to baby’s mouth for less mess. The unique straw valve opens as soon as a tot’s lips touch for easy drinking. Plus, the hinged cap closes to create a leakproof seal and protect the spout when not in use. The removable handles provide a comfortable grip for your little one, and the cap and straw are removable for easy, thorough cleaning.

productInformation.value: #3,623 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #137 in Baby Bottles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean; milk doesn’t leak
reviews.reviewText: This cup is extremely easy to clean and put back together. Everything can be put in the dishwasher. I was looking for a milk cup for my toddler that wouldn’t leak milk like the weighted straw cups do. This is perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to thoroughly clean
reviews.reviewText: This is by far my favorite toddler cup. We currently have a graveyard of other cops that just didn’t work out. I love that this cup can be completely taken apart and cleaned thoroughly. No risk of mold forming. We mostly put water in it, but we have put other things like smoothies as well with no issues. The only two things that are annoying is the handles don’t lock in place so it can get kind of awkward with their positioning versus where the straw is and the other thing is my son loves to throw his cup when he’s done eating and the straw cover almost always comes off. It does snap right back into position but a little annoying because if you’re not paying attention it can easily be lost.I’ve only had it leak a couple times, but I realized that if you don’t pull the straw all the way to where it “pops” into position when you’re putting it together it will leak. That was a user error.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good, but a very slow flow
reviews.reviewText: This cup doesn’t leak and is pretty easy to clean if have the right brushes (we use the oxo brushes). I really wish it had a weighted straw though. And your child has to bite down in just the right spot on the straw to drink otherwise it is pretty hard to get liquid from. Where they have to bite it pretty close to the top of the straw so I feel like babies transitioning from a bottle naturally put the straw in their mouths and bite in a different spot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toddler cup
reviews.reviewText: I had this cup with my first child and decided to try those sippy cups with the weights at the bottom of the straw with my second child- immediate regret! I knew I needed this cup again asap. It’s sturdy, well made, doesn’t leak, and has a great straw for littles learning to use one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sippy cup
reviews.reviewText: We love this cup! I’ve never had any issues with it spilling even though it gets tumbled around in my bag. There was a little bit of a learning curve for my baby to use it, but now it is the easiest sippy cup for him to drink from. You have to make sure a majority of the straw that is sticking out is in baby’s mouth for them to be able to suck water out. The only downside is I put some baby food purée on the straw while he was learning to use the cup and it stained the straw.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Leaves liquid in the bottom
reviews.reviewText: The big complaint I have is that the straw doesn’t go all the way down to the bottom of the cup, and therefore leaves liquid in the bottom! I was hoping to transition to this cup from a bottle for pumped milk, but it leaves about 1oz of milk on the bottom, so we have to use something else to get the last 1oz of milk out anyway. Sad :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best straw sippy cup ever! Never leaks!
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite straw sippy cup for my toddler.I have tried many other brands and they all leaked or didn’t survive been thrown around!This is the only one I’ve found to NOT leak, which was the most important factor for me because I have to carry it in my diaper bag and I’ve had other cups leak all over my bag!I had to find a cup that had a lid go over the top for this reason- I need it to be portable.My daughter has thrown this cup off her high chair table so many times I’ve lost count and it’s never gotten cracked.!She can drink out of it very easily. You do have to somewhat bite down on the straw in order to suck but this is how it is supposed to be fir a toddler/ baby learning to suck from a straw.Other negative reviews I’ve seen of this being a problem - they obvydidmt realize that that’s how it is supposed to be!! I thought the same at first but every straw cup that’s a transitional cup has this feature! It is meant to be like this so remember that!!I love that it has the handle so she can hold it well and then when and if you need to you can take it off.I honestly can’t recommend this OXO tot cup enough!It’s by far the best one out there! Don’t look any further!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cup! Doesn’t leak!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this cup for my infant who is transitioning to a water cup. I am happy with this one and have since ordered more! As long as the straw is pulled through all the way, it does not leak or spill, which is awesome! The straw is kind of hard to clean, but I’ll take it over a leaky cup any day.

reviews.reviewTitle: Took some time to get used to
reviews.reviewText: This took my toddler a few days to understand how to use. The straw needs to be bitten at the same time it needs to be sucked for the liquid to go up and through. This was a new action for my toddler but once she figured it out, it worked like a charm. No leaks and easy handles for her to grab on to

reviews.reviewTitle: My all time favourite sippy cup (without the top cover on)
reviews.reviewText: Okay so I need to say that I removed the top cover because whenever I would slide the cover over the straw, it would pinch the straw in the most perfect way to make it leak! But without that cover, I am so so happy that it DOES NOT leak. Like ever. We've been using it for 9 months and it's holding up great. Even when it has cold liquid and then that cold liquid gets warmer and warmer and rises up into the straw like any other straw cup... It will not leak. Unless maybe the end of the straw gets damaged by toddlers chewing on it. But anyway. I was really in need of another one and I didn't see any of the 9oz blue on amazon.ca so I over-paid to get one from amazon.com because that's how much I love that it doesn't leak! Oh and very easy to clean! Happy customer here. The lid is long gone so I just pretend it didn't even have one ;)

reviews.reviewTitle: ゴムパッキンがないタイプなので洗い物が楽です⭐️
reviews.reviewText: ストローに逆流防止弁があるタイプのマグ。これのおかげで食事中と外出時も飲み物をこぼさずとても助かっています。最初は何回か練習して飲めるようになりました！

leaks on an ongoing basis and at random times. for example when standing on the kitchen table, undisturbed - it leaks milk over the table from the seals. We bought as people reviewed and said was an awesome product - but the way in leaks it makes it really hard for our baby to drink and stay clean as it leaks from the lid and seals around the top despite unscrewing and reassembling multiple times.
